turkish_example_sentence: Onlar uzak dağ köyünü görseler hayatlarını değiştirirler.
english_example_sentence: If they were to see the remote mountain village, they would change their lives.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы они увидели отдаленную горную деревню, они бы изменили свою жизнь.
